Extract simple text features

la_features.Rd

Provides a lightweight baseline feature set from raw text:

  • character length

  • word count

  • type-token ratio (unique words / total words)

  • mean word length

Usage

la_features(df, engine = c("classic", "embeddings"), ...)

Arguments

df

data.frame with at least id and text columns

engine

"classic" (default) or "embeddings" (future extension)

...

reserved for engine-specific args

Value

data.frame with features, keyed by id
